Summary: Years of strange illnesses after multiple UFO sightings at Area 51
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Rachel
There were no other sightings in Rachel on or around March 9th 2005
divs: sighting detailsmy name is david manzi. please use the following information to look up a sighting report that i made back in 2006.(date submitted: 1\2\2006, date of event: 3\9\2005, state: nevada, couty: lincoln, short description: close call staking out area 51 in nevada) when i lived in cedar city, utah, i made frequent trips to area 51, aprox 2 hours to the west. the information listed above will help you find a sighting report that i made in 2006. since my sighting of multiple orange orbs in the sky at area 51, i have suffered with many strange ailments over the last 4 years. i have seen many doctors and have alot of er bills to prove it. i have been through hell with these doctors. i truly need some advice regarding these issues. i have procrastined for 4 years because i did not want to accept the possibility that my illnesses may have resulted from the encounters i had that night at area 51. i am a serious inquirer of help and advice. this has changed my life, maybe for the worse. please help. i need some closure on this. call me anytime. the time is now that i face this. i truly need your help. sincerely, david john manzi junior (406-593-0553) 625 13th st, butte, montana, 59701
